stripped_text: click, 1 credit: Install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server, then place 1 advancement counter on it. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
text: [click], 1[credit]: Install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server, then place 1 advancement counter on it. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
title: Saraswati Mnemonics: Endless Exploration
